metadata.title: CVE-2017-0855 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In MPEG4Extractor.cpp, there are several places where functions returnearly without cleaning up internal buffers which could lead to memoryleaks. This could lead to remote denial of service of a critical systemprocess with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction isnot needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1,7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0. Android ID: A-64452857.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
